verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, on the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* after they were come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* ye the \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* of all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, with the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \add their\add* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* by their \w polls|strong="H1538"\w*;

From \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that are able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w number|strong="H6485"\w* them by their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*.

And with you there shall be a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*; every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

¶ And these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* with you: of \add the tribe of\add* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*; \w Elizur|strong="H0468"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shedeur|strong="H7707"\w*.
Of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*; \w Shelumiel|strong="H8017"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zurishaddai|strong="H6701"\w*.
Of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; \w Nahshon|strong="H5177"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*.
Of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*; \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zuar|strong="H6686"\w*.
Of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*; \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Helon|strong="H2497"\w*.

Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*; \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w*: of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*; \w Gamaliel|strong="H1583"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pedahzur|strong="H6301"\w*.
Of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; \w Abidan|strong="H0027"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gideoni|strong="H1441"\w*.
Of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*; \w Ahiezer|strong="H0295"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammishaddai|strong="H5996"\w*.
Of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*; \w Pagiel|strong="H6295"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ocran|strong="H5918"\w*.
Of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*; \w Eliasaph|strong="H0460"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Deuel|strong="H1845"\w*.\f + \fr 1.14 \ft Deuel: also called, Reuel\f*
Of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*; \w Ahira|strong="H0299"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Enan|strong="H5881"\w*.

These \add  \+w were|strong="H7148"\+w*\add* the \w renowned|strong="H7121"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* \w in|strong="H1992"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* which are \w expressed|strong="H5344"\w* by \add their\add* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*:

And they \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w* on the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, and they declared their \w pedigrees|strong="H3205"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, by their \w polls|strong="H1538"\w*.

As the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so he \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Israel’s|strong="H3478"\w* eldest \w son|strong="H1060"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, by their \w polls|strong="H1538"\w*, every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, by their \w polls|strong="H1538"\w*, every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add were\add* threescore and \w fourteen|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \add namely\add*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \add were\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \add were\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \add were\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, throughout their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*;

Those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add even\add* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

These \add are\add* those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add being\add* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: \w each|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* was for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

So were all those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, all that were able to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;

Even all they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* were \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*.
¶ But the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* after the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* were not \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.
For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Only thou shalt not \w number|strong="H6485"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, neither \w take|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* of them \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

But thou shalt \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* over the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, and over all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, and over all things that \add belong\add* to it: they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof; and they shall \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto it, and shall \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And when the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* setteth \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall take it \w down|strong="H3381"\w*: and when the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* is to be \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w*, the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall set it \w up|strong="H6965"\w*: and the \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* that cometh \w nigh|strong="H7131"\w* shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall pitch their \w tents|strong="H2583"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* by his own \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* by his own \w standard|strong="H1714"\w*, throughout their \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

But the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall \w pitch|strong="H2583"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, that there be no \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* upon the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* they.
